reviewtext: I have a cable system that has an A-B switch.  Tivo does not support this.  Their solution is to decide between using Tivo on "A" or  "B".  And when I wanted to switch, it took a 2 hour set up.  Also, if your system requires a cable box you probably wont be able to  watch another channel while Tivo is recording. (you would need another  cable box or cable tuner of some sort)
